content.answer: Yes. In 2019, Erica Wheeler became the first undrafted player to earn WNBA All-Star MVP. Wheeler finished with 25 points and an All-Star Game record-tying seven 3-pointers, including a trey with 22 seconds to go that sealed Team Wilsonâ€™s 129-126 win over Team Delle Donne.
content.name: Is there a WNBA All-Star Game?
content.question: Is there a WNBA All-Star Game?
